name: Digital Bullet Journal
description: Progressive Web App that aims to capture the user experience of the paper-based "Bullet Journal" planning system digitally.

name: McIntire Fruit
description: Digital storefront designed and developed for a fictional organic fruit-and-veg company.

name: Meow Meow Chat
description: Fully featured websocket driven chat room with a cute cat theme.

name: To-Do To-Day
description: Daily to-do list web application developed using React and styled using TailwindCSS.

name: Blinkie Maker
description: Old-school blinkie maker with a drag-and-drop editor for creating pixel-themed GIFs.

name: Gift Profile
description: Create a profile to share your gift preferences, clothing sizes and wishlists with your friends and family.
